Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I have a question and hope someone is nice and may be able to answer it. Since the update 1.2.1 my game crashes after some minutes of playing, I think it's 20-30 minutes. I have no mods installed and even tried to reinstall KSP, but it keeps crashing. I inserted the crash-report-files from the last crash so you guys can have a look at them and maybe tell me whats the Problem. Also I forgot to mention that this happens in the 32bit Version but also in the 64bit Version. I really hope someone can help me.

 

 

error file:

Hi @le_JEW, please disable "Part highlighter enabled in flight" from the settings screen and see if the crashing stops for you.
OK I'll try this out and I'll let you know if it worked, but thanks a lot already^^
it seems to work now, thanks. You really saved my day

9 hours ago, sal_vager said:

Hi @le_JEW, please disable "Part highlighter enabled in flight" from the settings screen and see if the crashing stops for you.

Thank you so much, it looks you saved my game, also!  

my crash report
